subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Do not confuse {{lang|mul|æœˆ}} with {{m|mul|âº¼|sc=Hani}}, a form of {{m|mul|è‚‰||flesh, meat}} when used as the left-hand radical of a character. {{m|mul|âº¼|sc=Hani}} is used for parts of the body such as {{m|mul|èƒŒ||back}} or {{m|mul|è‚||liver}}. These may be written identically as {{lang|mul|æœˆ}}, but in careful use they are distinguished, with the inside of {{lang|mul|âº¼|sc=Hani}} being written with unattached diagonal strokes. This is particularly an issue in looking up characters by radical; compare the [[Index:Chinese radical/æœˆ|æœˆ index]] and [[Index:Chinese radical/è‚‰|è‚‰ index]].
